amendment.description: To require a report on the defense modeling and simulation industrial base.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1785 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1785 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8014-8015) To require a report on the defense modeling and simulation industrial base.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1785 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1785 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
